          <title>
            <string language="fi">Savilevy muottiin</string>
            <string language="en">Clay slab into the mould</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehmplatte in die Form</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Galette d'argile dans le moule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Laje da argila no molde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lastra dell'argilla nella muffa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πλάκα αργίλου στη φόρμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Losa de la arcilla en el molde</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fi">Piirroksessa näytetään, miten savilevy asetetaan yksiosaiseen prässimuottiin.</string>
            <string language="en">The drawing shows how a clay slab is placed into a one-piece press mould.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">one-piece</string>
            <string language="en">slab</string>
            <string language="en">press</string>
            <string language="en">mould</string>
            <string language="en">clay</string>
            <string language="fi">savi</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityökasvatus</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityö</string>
            <string language="fi">yksiosaiset</string>
            <string language="fi">muottitekniikka,</string>
            <string language="fi">prässimuotit</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Zeichnung zeigt, wie eine Lehmplatte in eine 
einteilige Presseform plaziert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le schéma montre comment une galette d'argile 
est placée dans un moule d'une seule pièce de presse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O desenho mostra como uma laje da argila é 
colocada em um molde de uma peça só da imprensa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'illustrazione mostra come una lastra 
dell'argilla è disposta in una muffa di un pezzo della pressa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχέδιο επιδεικνύει πώς μια πλάκα αργίλου 
τοποθετείται σε μια one-piece φόρμα Τύπου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El gráfico muestra cómo una losa de la arcilla 
se coloca en un molde de una sola pieza de la prensa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">einteilig</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Platte</string>
          </keyword>
